response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its worth of $1,000,000 to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it from me at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a reduced cost. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
